megaradrp.instrument — Static configuration¶

megaradrp.instrument.configs — Static configuration¶

Documention of the module

megaradrp.processing.wavecalibration —¶

Corrector for wavecalibration

class megaradrp.processing.wavecalibration.WavelengthCalibrator(solutionwl, datamodel=None, dtype='float32')¶

A Node that applies wavelength calibration.

map_borders(wls)¶

Compute borders of pixels for interpolation.

The border of the pixel is assumed to be midway of the wls
